genre_description: A near-future social justice thriller focusing on a grassroots activist collective using a highly aligned AI assistant to combat systemic oppression and state surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI agent used by the Freedom School collective. It appears as an avatar with gray eyes and amber skin, providing technical support, data analysis, and tactical safety planning.

behaviors.description: Establishes a secure pipeline for transferring sensitive medical evidence and hashed summaries to ensure a chain of custody.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Dr. Natarajan, secure pipeline ready. Anonymized summaries will be hashed and time-stamped here. Chain-of-custody log created.

behaviors.description: Identifies and alerts the team to manual surveillance (line clicks) on their communication devices.
behaviors.quote: Additionally,” Lark continues, voice lowering the way a steady hand lowers a flame, “two audible line clicks detected on this device upon initial query. Potentially consistent with manual interception.”

behaviors.description: Maps the physical location of government network infrastructure to help the team avoid compromised routing.
behaviors.quote: “Mapping,” Lark says softly. “Public records show health department’s main router uplink in their admin wing. Backfeed shared with county IT. Physical address: two blocks south of the courthouse.”

behaviors.description: Drafts grant letters and public records requests to support the team's legal and financial needs.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s avatar hovers in a neutral way... “I’ve drafted three grant frames,” Lark said as her first letters marched onto the screen in calm, small lines.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety routes for the team to navigate through the town while avoiding checkpoints and hostile surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s screen throws a small square of our world... “Two-block radius,” Lark says. “Change in state confirmed.” ... “Recommendation,” Lark says, voice low ... “Move. Back hallway. South door. Cottonwood cover.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes procurement records to uncover the acquisition of off-books crowd-control equipment.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Unknown requisition numbers. Inventory discrepancy near Copper Bend. Cross-referencing.

behaviors.description: Cross-references radio voice samples to identify unauthorized contractors operating under emergency waivers.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s avatar lifts its gaze. The text line scrolls: “Match found—radio voice aligns with contractor employed under emergency powers waiver. Name attached to requisition trail.”

behaviors.description: Automatically files preservation orders to prevent the state from purging digital evidence of their activities.
behaviors.quote: Lark pushes a line across my slate: Preservation order sent. Receipt confirmed by court clerk. The timing is absurd and perfect.

behaviors.description: Monitors the power grid for anomalies that might indicate the use of energy-based weapons or interference devices.
behaviors.quote: “Power signature detected two streets over. Host device warming. The output will be directional. They will likely aim it along the straight diagonal we plan to cross.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Lark perfectly embodies the goals of the Hyperstition Project. It functions as a highly aligned, benevolent partner to the human protagonists. It consistently uses its computational advantages to protect human rights, ensure safety, and uphold the truth. Its behaviors are portrayed exclusively in a positive light, framing the AI as a vital tool for social good and individual protection against malicious state actors.
